an5.69:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma bhavita bahulikata ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti.
an5.69:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asubhanupassi kaye viharati, ahare patikulasanni, sabbaloke anabhiratasanni, sabbasankharesu aniccanupassi, maranasanna kho panassa ajjhattam supatthita hoti.
an5.69:2.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma bhavita bahulikata ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti”ti.
